A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie. Even though there were a few plot holes and unrealistic aspects\, I hardly even noticed them because I was so immersed in the story. The comic relief kept the movie from getting too heavy\, and the fight scenes were really cool as well. The characters were great and I left the theater with a giant grin on my face. I recommend it. Watch it for yourself and form an opinion. Some like it\, and some just don't.
